ca.uhn.fhir.context

Class ProvidedResourceScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uhn.fhir.context.ProvidedResourceScanner

  • public class ProvidedResourceScanner
extends Object
    Scans a class tagged with ProvidesResources and adds any resources listed to its FhirContext's resource definition list. This makes the profile generator find the classes.
    See Also:
    ProvidesResources

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void scanForProvidedResources(Object theProvider)
      If theProvider is tagged with the ProvidesResources annotation, this method will add every resource listed by the resources method.

      • ProvidedResourceScanner

        public ProvidedResourceScanner(FhirContext theContext)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        theContext - - context whose resource definition list is to be updated by the scanner

    • Method Detail

      • scanForProvidedResources

        public void scanForProvidedResources(Object theProvider)
        If theProvider is tagged with the ProvidesResources annotation, this method will add every resource listed by the resources method.

        Notes:

        • if theProvider isn't annotated with resources nothing is done; it's expected that most RestfulServers and ResourceProviders won't be annotated.
        • any object listed in resources that doesn't implement IResource will generate a warning in the log.
        Parameters:
        theProvider - - Normally, either a RestfulServer or a IResourceProvider that might be annotated with ProvidesResources
